name: Crab it away!
description:
Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Shoot: Aim towards mouse pointer and shoot with left or right mouse button

Dash: SPACE

Switch weapon (if you have picked up the canon): SHIFT

An evil crab is on your ship and your bullets doesn't hurt it the very least! The only thing you can do now is to keep it away! Try to survive as long as possible to the increasingly faster crab

Made by Emil in three days for the BenBonk game jam (I missed half the jam). The limitation was to only use four colours and the optional theme was "keep it away"!
